settings.label: Duration
settings.info: Important note: Time counts in milliseconds, 1 second equals 1000 milliseconds. If this field is empty, by default, all animations use a 200ms duration. This time is used for changing colors of UI elements, opening menu, modals, etc. You can use positive numbers between 0 and 10000 only
